  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardsPlayabilityEvent
    This event is sent in response to a CardsPlayabilityRequest.
    ChosenObjectiveCardEvent
    This event is used to notify about a player that chose its objective card.
    ChosenStarterCardSideEvent
    This event is used to notify that a player has chosen the side of his starter card.
    DirectMessageEvent
    A direct message from a player to another.
    DrawnGoldDeckCardEvent
    This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from the gold cards' deck.
    DrawnObjectiveCardsEvent
    Thi event notify that a player has drawn his possible objective cards.
    DrawnResourceDeckCardEvent
    This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from the resource cards' deck.
    DrawnStarterCardEvent
    THis event is used to notify that a starter card has been drawn by a player.
    DrawnVisibleGoldCardEvent
    This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from visible gold cards.
    DrawnVisibleResourceCardEvent
    This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from visible resource cards.
    EndedInitializationPhaseEvent
    This event is sent after initializing the model.
    EndedObjectiveCardPhaseEvent
    This event is sento to notify then end of the objective cards drawing phase.
    EndedStarterCardPhaseEvent
    This event is used to notify about the end of the starter cards drawing.
    EndedTokenPhaseEvent
    This event is used to notify the end of token phase.
    GameErrorEvent
    This class is used to notify about a general error in the game phases.
    GameEvent
    This abstract class represents a game event.
    GameResultsEvent
    This event is used to notify about the results at the end of the game.
    GameStartedEvent
    Event to signal that the game has been started.
    GroupMessageEvent
    Event for a message that is sent to all player in the lobby.
    LastConnectedPlayerEvent
    Event sent when the player is the last one connected to the game.
    LastConnectedPlayerWonEvent
    Event sent when the last connected player is the winner of the game.
    LastRoundEvent
    Event sent at the start of the last round of the game.
    MessageEvent
    A generic event for chat messages.
    PlayedCardEvent
    This event is used to notify that a card has been played by a player.
    PlayerElementsEvent
    This event is used to notify about a player's updated elements' map.
    PlayerTurnEvent
    Event that signals that a player's turn started.
    TokenAssignmentEvent
    This event is used to notify that a token has been assigned to a player.
    UpdatedScoreTrackEvent
    This event is used to notify an update of a player's points.
